department: Library and Archives Canada (Bibliothèque et Archives Canada)
description: Purchase and delivery of office furniture for the Winnipeg RSC Building, Manitoba.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Category 3 - CST - Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets

#### Tender Details
- **Tender Reference:** PW-22-01014247
- **Amendment Number:** 3
- **Solicitation Number:** 5Z011-23-0216
- **Publication Date:** November 22, 2022
- **Closing Date:** December 6, 2022, 14:00:00
- **Amendment Date:** December 1, 2022
- **Contract Duration:** To be Determined
- **Tender Status:** Expired

#### Procurement Information
- **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (G & S)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Limited Tendering
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
- **Regions of Delivery:** Manitoba

#### End-user Information
- **End-user Entity:** Library and Archives Canada
- **Address:** 395 Wellington Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0N4, Canada

#### Contact Information
- **Contact Person:** Isabelle Legault
- **Job Title:** [Insert Job Title]
- **Email:** isabelle.legault@bac-lac.gc.ca
- **Phone:** 613-410-4428
- **Address:** 550 De la Cité, Gatineau, QC K1A 0N4, Canada

#### Tender Description
Library and Archives Canada (LAC) is seeking to purchase and deliver office furniture to Winnipeg RSC Building, Loading Dock, 1700 Inkster BLVD, Winnipeg, Manitoba, R2X 2T1 by January 27th, 2023. The procurement covers a requirement for Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets under Category 3 of the Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C.

#### Required Attachments
- Winnipeg Floor Plan
- Standard Request for Bids (English)
- Questions and Answers (English)
- Standard Request for Bids (French)
- Questions and Answers (French)
